short_summary: The purchasing intention is to acquire the Manitoba Cold Storage Project building to provide treaty right holders of the Manitoba First Nation
description: In order to advance the Kingsclear First Nation's economic objectives, the Catfish Band is seeking the purchase of the Manitoba Cold Storage building located in Le Pas Manitoba. The purpose of this project is to facilitate the purchase of the Manitoba Cold Storage Project building to provide treaty right holders of the Manitoba First Nation. The project involves the construction of ,825 XLUQ
tags: Notice for Procurement Related to Specific Community assistance
request for Information related to community assistance service Giấy
